CustomField.formula: SUBSTITUTE(Community_URL__c+'?product={ !'+Object_Api_Name__c +'.'+Product_API_Name__c+'}&amount={ !'+ Object_Api_Name__c +'.'+Amount_API_Name__c +'}&refid={ !'+ Object_Api_Name__c +'.'+RefId_Api_Name__c +'}&firstname={ !'+ Object_Api_Name__c +'.'+First_Name_API_Name__c +'}&lastname={ !'+Object_Api_Name__c +'.'+Last_Name_API_Name__c+'}&customerid={ !'+ Object_Api_Name__c +'.'+Customer_Id_API_Name__c +'}&company={ !'+ Object_Api_Name__c +'.'+Company_API_Name__c +'}&street={ !'+ Object_Api_Name__c +'.'+Address_API_Name__c +'}&city={ !'+Object_Api_Name__c +'.'+City_API_Name__c+'}&state={ !'+Object_Api_Name__c +'.'+State_API_Name__c+'}&zip={ !'+Object_Api_Name__c +'.'+Zip_API_Name__c+'}&country={ !'+Object_Api_Name__c +'.'+Country_API_Name__c+'}&email={ !'+Object_Api_Name__c +'.'+Email_API_Name__c+'}&objectapiname='+Object_Api_Name__c+'&fieldapiname='+SObject_Payment_Lookup_API_Name__c+'&returl={ !'+ Object_Api_Name__c +'.'+Return_URL_API_Name__c+'}&custom1=1'+Custom_1__c+'&custom2='+Custom_2__c+'&custom3='+Custom_3__c+'&custom4='+Custom_4__c+'&subheader={ !'+Object_Api_Name__c+'.'+Sub_Header_API_Name__c+'}', " ", "")
CustomField.label: External Payment URL
